description: Hikaru`s older sister. A former Four Star Academy student and former S4`s representative of Flower Song Class during her time. Hotaru was the first person to have experienced a mysterious power, before Hime and Yume. But due to relying on that power too much, she lost her ability to sing. Her voice was known as "The Fleeting Shooting Star". Now, Hotaru is a gardener.
name: Yukino Hotaru
